text: tama paramādhipatigē tṛptiya apēkṣāven udē savasa tama paramādhipatiṭa prārthanā karannan saman̆ga num̆ba da ivasā siṭinu. melova jīvitayē alaṁkāraya priya karamin num̆bagē dǣs ovungen ivataṭa yomu nokaranu. tama āśāvan anugamanaya kaḷā vū da, apa va menehi kirīmen ohugē hadavata nosælakilimatbhāvayaṭa apa pat kaḷā vū ayaṭa num̆ba avanata novanu. tavada ohugē karuṇa apatē yannak viya
